---
title: "Learning more"
---

For additional information on NASA's Earth Observation data, please checkout these additional resources: 

- [Earthdata Cloud Cookbook](https://nasa-openscapes.github.io/earthdata-cloud-cookbook/): General information on accessing Earthdata
- [`earthaccess`](https://earthaccess.readthedocs.io/en/latest/): One stop shop for programmatic login, search, and access to Earthdata using Python
- [Earthdata Search](https://search.earthdata.nasa.gov/search): Graphical interface for searching and discovering NASA Earthdata datasets
- [`ncompare`](https://ncompare.readthedocs.io/en/stable/): ASDC's tool for comparing structure of netCDF files
